paper.title: Beyond risk parity - A machine learning-based hierarchical risk parity approach on cryptocurrencies
paper.abstract: It has long been known that estimating large empirical covariance matrices can lead to very unstable solutions, with estimation errors more than offsetting the benefits of diversification. In this study, we employ the Hierarchical Risk Parity approach, which applies state-of-the-art mathematics including graph theory and unsupervised machine learning to a large portfolio of cryptocurrencies. An out-of-sample comparison with traditional risk-minimization methods reveals that Hierarchical Risk Parity outperforms in terms of tail risk-adjusted return, thereby working as a potential risk management tool that can help cryptocurrency investors to better manage portfolio risk. The results are robust to different rebalancing intervals, covariance estimation windows and methodologies.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是应用机器学习和图理论的Hierarchical Risk Parity方法，旨在优化加密货币投资组合的风险调整回报，并作为风险管理工具。这直接涉及投资组合的风险管理和优化，属于金融风险管理和投资组合管理的范畴。
